mapper.select: select * from cs_order where begin_date >= #{beginDate} and end_date <= #{endDate} and id=(select orderId from cs_order_ip where serviceId = #{serviceId} and ip = #{ip})
select * from cs_asset where userid=#{userId} and (name=#{name} or addr=#{addr})
SELECT a.id,a.addr,a.name,dis.name FROM cs_asset a,cs_district dis where a.districtId = dis.id and a.status = 1 order by a.create_date desc
SELECT a.id,a.addr,a.name,dis.name as disName FROM cs_asset a,cs_district dis where a.districtId = dis.id and a.status = 1 order by a.create_date desc LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
